channel.title: Need some help...[Edited]
channel.description:
Here are questions I would like you to answer in order. Question one, would like you to answer as "A to Q 1:" and so forth. Here are the questions (on tuts of course I am not on the wrong forum).
Q1: How come everytime I try to change text like what an NPC is saying or how to change rules it never works? What might be wrong? Q2: What code do I find to change the ::rules and the page that first pops-up when you log in? Q3: Whats the code for when you right click a player for admins, it says "ban"? *And please dont say "oh your on the wrong forum" or "Read the rules noob!" just answer the q's please, it wouldnt kill you.

item.title: Need some help...[Edited]
item.dc:creator: @andrew1234321 andrew1234321
item.description:
@andrew1234321 wrote:

ill help one sec ill edit this…

A1: Open shops.cfg, look at what the shop name is ingame (should show up like SOMETHING SHOP on the same place where close window is ingame) change those item ids, first number is item id, second is ammount, so on…

A2: search for

[code]else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("rules"))[/code]

tell me what u see under it

(should be something like)

{ playerMenu(); }

A3: what kind of command do u want to make?

search for

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase

then add

one of these three under it…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("train") && (playerRights >= 3)) { // master by i loot i addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); sendMessage("Enrit Has Trained U to A Master"); } to add skill xp

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pwn") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(6585,1); addItem(6570,1); addItem(4720,1); addItem(4714,1); addItem(6524,1); addItem(4131,1); addItem(775,1); addItem(4151,1); } to add items

and

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("varrok")) { teleportToX = 3254; teleportToY = 3421; heightLevel = 0; MainHelpMenu(); sendMessage("I hope a monkey eats your brains....."); } to tele…
A4: I don’t know/have that code sorry

Read full topic
